items.sentence: Tom went to the hospital because he'd been injured.
Tom went to the hospital because he had a bad cold.
Tom was the first person to ask me why I was there.
Tom was going really fast when he ran off the road.
This is the most exciting book that I've ever read.
Things will get a lot worse before they get better.
None of Tom's teammates seem to like him very much.
Tom suffers from narcissistic personality disorder.
Tom just told me he doesn't plan to stay in Boston.
Tom seems to take it for granted he'll get the job.
